QuestData.Title: A Personal Favor
QuestData.Description: Hmmm? A box you say? Or was it several? Do you know what material the box was constructed from?$B$BAnd what was the name of this merchant? Empoor? Are you certain that he's one of the Broken? I don't do much business with their kind.$B$BPerhaps my memory would be jogged if you were to do me a favor?$B$BThe Skithian arakkoa - primitive casters that they are - recently stole a huge shipment of my more exotic goods. I want it all back!$B$BYou can find Veil Skith just to the south of Shattrath City.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve 5 of Lathrai's Stolen Goods. Return them to Wind Trader Lathrai near the World's End Tavern in the Lower City section of Shattrath City.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, indeed, I do believe that it's all getting clearer now.$B$BAnd I think that your diligence in this matter deserves more than just the information that you seek.
